title: The countrey cozen, or: The crafty city dame Who invited a gentleman to her house in womans apparel, whereby her husband was deceived, he taking him for a she countrey cozen, and how he found out, and punished the deceipt. Tune of, Good Morrow Valentine.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, at the golden ball in West-smithfield, near the Hospital-gate,
